title: Google Cloud IoT Core for PHP
name: Google Cloud IoT Core for PHP
description:
Idiomatic PHP client for Google Cloud IoT Core.

  • Homepage
  • API documentation

NOTE: This repository a Read-Only subtree split of Google Cloud PHP. Any support requests, bug reports, or development contributions should be directed to that project. Additional tests and build information can also be found at the parent project.

If it is not already installed, you will also require the gRPC extension. For installation instructions, see here.

NOTE: In addition to the gRPC extension, we recommend installing the protobuf extension for improved performance. For installation instructions, see here.

Installation

$ composer require google/cloud-iot
